46.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)

1.movie_plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

20.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

91.movie_plot: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

68.movie_plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

31.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)

8.movie_plot: The son of the Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

95.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

60.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

94.movie_plot: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

89.movie_plot: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

86.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

15.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
15.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

17.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

57.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
57.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".
